mapper.select:
SELECT distinct m.BR_NO "id", m.BR_NO "key", m.jrjgmc "text", m.jrjgbm "jrjgbm", m.jgjb, m.sjgljgnbjgh "pid",
case when #{sjzt} ='1' then '已上报' when #{sjzt} ='2' then '未上报' end "sjzt",
case when b.code is null then '未上报' else '已上报' end as "sjzt",
m.SX FROM hbjyods.JRJGXX m
left join bsgl b on b.SJRQ = TO_DATE(#{bsrq}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.WJBM = 'jrkc' and b.nbjgh = m.BR_NO
where 1=1
and m.jgjb in (#{level},#{levelTwo},#{levelThree})
order by m.SX

choose.when:
and m.BR_NO in ( select distinct br_no from
(select * from hbjyods.jrjgxx where jgjb in (#{level},#{levelTwo},#{levelThree}))
hbjyods.jrjgxx
start with br_no in ( select distinct nbjgh from bsgl where 1=1
and SJRQ =TO_DATE( #{bsrq},'yyyy-mm-dd')
and WJBM = #{bbbm}
and nbjgh in( select distinct f.br_no from hbjyods.jrjgxx f where 1=1 start with f.br_no=#{nbjgh} connect by f.sjgljgnbjgh = prior f.br_no )
) connect by br_no = prior sjgljgnbjgh )

mapper.select: select s.dw_id,s.dw_name,c.code_value dwjb,IFNULL(s.sjdw_id,'--') sjdw_id,IFNULL(s.sjdw_name,'--') sjdw_name,IFNULL(s.dqdm,'--') dqdm,IFNULL(s.bz,'--') bz from zzrh_code_falv.sbdw_code s left join zzrh_code_falv.code_dwjb c on c.code_key = s.dw_jb order by s.dqdm,s.dw_jb;
